name: viirs_ntl_annual_v20_cf_cvg
title: Annual VIIRS Nighttime Lights v2 - Count of Cloud Free Coverage
description: Annual VIIRS nighttime lights product Version 2. Count of pixels within boundary with at least 1 cloud free observation of nighttime lights. Can be used in combination with VIIRS Nighttime Light Average product to determine if sufficient coverage exists with boundary features.

extract_types_info.sum: count of pixels with at least one cloud free measurement within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: C. D. Elvidge, M. Zhizhin, T. Ghosh, F-C. Hsu, Annual time series of global VIIRS nighttime lights derived from monthly averages: 2012 to 2019, Remote Sensing
extras.sources_name: Earth Observation Group - VIIRS Nighttime Lights
